thread.title: Volkswagen CNY deals – RM67k ang pow up for grabs
thread.title_full: Volkswagen CNY deals – RM67k ang pow up for grabs

author: Jonathan Lee
title: Volkswagen CNY deals – RM67k ang pow up for grabs
text:
Home » Cars » Volkswagen CNY deals – RM67k ang pow up for grabs Volkswagen CNY deals – RM67k ang pow up for grabs / 2 comments 
Aside from a trade-in programme for the new Jetta and Passat , Volkswagen Passenger Cars Malaysia (VPCM) is also gearing up for the Chinese New Year with its “Biggest Ang Pow of the Year” promotion. 
How big? Customers who purchase a new Volkswagen from now until February 15 will stand a chance to win an ang pow packet of a whopping RM66,888 – equivalent to the entire nett selling price of the Vento Trendline. Additionally, the company is offering rebates of between RM388 and RM1,288 on all models. 
To qualify, the cars – including the Polo , Golf , Beetle , Vento , Jetta and Passat – must be booked within the promotion period, and is subject to terms and conditions, while stocks last. You can visit the nearest Volkswagen dealer for more information. Research Volkswagen Cars at
